bibl.title: Ptocheia or Odysseus in Disguise at Troy (P. Köln VI 245). Edition and Commentary.

bibl.seg: PARCA Maryline G., Ptocheia or Odysseus in Disguise at Troy (P. Köln VI 245). Edition and Commentary. (American Studies in Papyrology. 31.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1991, 8°, xxv-130 pp. et 3 pll.
1. The Text of P. Köln VI, 245. - 2. Commentary. - 3. Mythological and Literary Background. - 4. Greek Letters in Roman Upper Egypt. - Excursus: The Trojan Palladium. Indices.
C.R. par Ingrid E. Holmberg, BMCRev 5 (1994) No. 2, pp. 152-154. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 67 (1992) No. 134, pp. 372-373. - Amphilochios Papathomas, Tyche 11 (1996) pp. 288-292.
